subject: You are the jackpot winner! Claim now
bodyHTML:
Dear Jhon,

Congratulations! You are the lucky winner of our gigantic jackpot prize.

To claim your life-changing reward, please click the secure claim link below:
https://prize-claim-link.com

This is an incredible opportunity—act swiftly to secure your prize and embark on a journey of endless possibilities!

Best wishes,
Samantha Thompson
Prize Claims Team
